description: This a single ensemble member of the AMIP DECK experiment which contains additional outputs which are required for model evaluation using COSP, and as control values for model outputs in the amip-p4K, amip-4xCO2, amip-future4K and amip-m4K experiments.

Questions/Comments/Notes: special output requested.

description: As CMIP5/CFMIP-2 amip4K experiment.  AMIP experiment where SSTs are subject to a uniform warming of 4K.

Questions/Comments/Notes: changed name from amip4K in CMIP5  to parallel other expts. in CMIP6.

description: As CMIP5/CFMIP-2 amip4xCO2 experiment.  AMIP experiment where SSTs are held at control values and the CO2 seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled.
experiment title: AMIP SSTs with 4xCO2

description: As CMIP5/CFMIP-2 amipFuture experiment.  AMIP experiment where SSTs are subject to a composite SST warming pattern derived from coupled models, scaled to an ice-free ocean mean of 4K.

description: As amip experiment but SSTs are subject to a uniform cooling of 4K.

description: Identical to standard AMIP experiment but from 1870-present with constant pre-industrial forcing levels (anthro & natural)

description: Extended version of CMIP5/CFMIP-2 aqua4xCO2 experiment.  Aquaplanet experiment where SSTs are held at control values and the CO2 seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled.
experiment title: aquaplanet with control SST and 4xCO2

description: Extended version of CMIP5/CFMIP-2 aquaControl experiment.  Aquaplanet (no land) experiment with no seasonal cycle forced with specified zonally symmetric SSTs.
experiment title: aquaplanet control

description: As amip experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code.
experiment title: AMIP experiment with longwave cloud-radiative effects off

description: As amip-p4K experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code.
experiment title: AMIP experiment with uniform 4K SST increase and with longwave cloud radiative effects off

description: As aqua-p4K experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code.
experiment title: aquaplanet with uniform 4K SST increase and with longwave cloud radiative effects off

description: As aqua-control experiment, but with cloud-radiative effects switched off in the LW radiation code.
experiment title: aquaplanet control with longwave cloud radiative effects off

description: An AGCM experiment with monthly-varying SSTs, sea-ice, atmospheric constituents and any other necessary boundary conditions (e.g. vegetation if required) taken from each model's own piControl run (using the 30 years of piControl that are parallel to years 111-140 of its abrupt4xCO2 run). Dynamic vegetation should be turned off in all the piSST set of experiments.
experiment title: experiment forced with pre-industrial SSTs, sea ice and atmospheric constituents.
Questions/Comments/Notes: This is *not* a climatology.

description: Same as piSST, but with a spatially and temporally uniform SST anomaly applied on top of the monthly-varying piSST SSTs. The magnitude of the uniform increase is taken from each model's global, climatological annual mean SST change between abrupt4xCO2 minus piControl (using the mean of years 111-140 of abrupt4xCO2, and the parallel 30-year section of piControl).
experiment title: as piSST with uniform SST increase with magnitude based on abrupt4xCO2 response

description: Same as piSST but CO2 as seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled.
experiment title: as piSST with radiation-only seeing 4xCO2

description: Same as piSST but CO2 is quadrupled. The increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation.
experiment title: as piSST with radiation and vegetation seeing 4xCO2

description: As piSST, but with monthly-varying SSTs taken from years 111-140 of each model's own abrupt4xCO2 experiment instead of from piControl. Sea-ice is unchanged from piSST.
experiment title: as piSST but with SSTs from abrupt4xCO2

description: As piSST, but with monthly-varying SSTs and sea-ice taken from years 111-140 of each model's own abrupt4xCO2 experiment instead of from piControl.
experiment title: as piSST but with SSTs and sea ice from abrupt4xCO2

description: As a4SSTice, but CO2 is quadrupled, and the increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation.
experiment title: as piSST but with SSTs and sea ice from abrupt4xCO2, and 4xCO2 seen by radiation and vegetation.

description: Same as amip, but a patterned SST anomaly is applied on top of the monthly-varying amip SSTs. This anomaly is a monthly climatology, taken from each model's own abrupt4xCO2 run minus piControl (using the mean of years 111-140 of abrupt4xCO2, and the parallel 30-year section of piControl). CO2 is quadrupled, and the increase in CO2 is seen by both the radiation scheme and vegetation.
experiment title: as AMIP but with warming pattern from abrupt4xCO2 added to SSTs and 4xCO2 seen by radiation and vegetation

description: * Historical well-mixed GHG-only run. * Models with interactive chemistry schemes should either turn off the chemistry or use a preindustrial climatology of stratospheric and tropospheric ozone in their radiation schemes.  This will ensure that ozone is fixed in all these simulations, and simulated responses in models with and without coupled chemistry are comparable.
experiment title: historical well-mixed GHG-only run

description: Historical natural-only run
experiment title: historical natural-only run

description: Historical solar-only transient simulation using  settings from CMIP6 historical simulation but fixed GHG&ODS (1850 level)
experiment title: historical solar-only run

description: * Historical stratospheric-ozone-only. *  In models with coupled chemistry, the chemistry scheme should be turned off, and the simulated ensemble mean monthly mean 3D stratospheric ozone concentrations from the histALL simulations should be prescribed. Tropospheric ozone should be fixed at 3D long-term monthly mean piControl values, with a value of 100 ppbv ozone concentration in this piControl climatology used to separate the troposphere from the stratosphere. * In models without coupled chemistry the same stratospheric ozone prescribed in histALL should be prescribed. Stratospheric ozone concentrations will be provided by CCMI.
experiment title: historical stratospheric-ozone-only run

description: Historical volcanic-only run
experiment title: historical volcanic-only run

description: Extension of aerosol-only run under SSP2-4.5
experiment title: aerosol-only SSP2-4.5 run

description: *  Extension of well-mixed GHG-only run under SSP2-4.5. *  Models with interactive chemistry schemes should either turn off the chemistry or use a preindustrial climatology of stratospheric and tropospheric ozone in their radiation schemes.
experiment title: well-mixed GHG-only SSP2-4.5 run

description: Extension of natural-only run under SSP2-4.5.
experiment title: natural-only SSP2-4.5 run

description: * Extension of stratospheric-ozone-only run under SSP2-4.5 *   In models with coupled chemistry, the chemistry scheme should be turned off, and the simulated ensemble mean monthly mean 3D stratospheric ozone concentrations from the SSP2-4.5 simulations should be prescribed. Tropospheric ozone should be fixed at 3D long-term monthly mean piControl values, with a value of 100 ppbv ozone concentration in this piControl climatology used to separate the troposphere from the stratosphere. * In models without coupled chemistry the same stratospheric ozone prescribed in SSP2-4.5 should be prescribed. Stratospheric ozone concentrations will be provided by CCMI.
experiment title: stratospheric-ozone-only SSP2-4.5 run

description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean simultaneously by surface windstress (as in the wind experiment), net heat flux (as in the heat experiment) and net freshwater flux (as in the water experiment) anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2, using a passive tracer to prevent negative climate feedback on the heat flux applied
experiment title: control plus perturbative surface fluxes of momentum, heat and water into ocean

description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean by surface net heat flux anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2, using a passive tracer to prevent negative climate feedback on the heat flux applied
experiment title: control plus perturbative surface flux of heat into ocean

description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, with a flux of passive tracer added at the ocean surface at the same rate as the surface net heat flux anomaly applied in the FAFMIP heat experiment.
experiment title: control plus surface flux of passive heat tracer into ocean

description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean by surface windstress anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2
experiment title: control plus perturbative surface flux of momentum into ocean

description: 1xCO2 experiment, parallel to piControl, forced over the ocean by surface net freshwater flux anomalies obtained from the CMIP5 ensemble mean of 1pctCO2 experiments at the time of 2xCO2
experiment title: control plus perturbative surface flux of water into ocean

description: Beginning from a preindustrial control run, simultaneously quadruple the CO2 concentration and reduce the solar constant such that the TOA radiative flux remains within +/m0.1 W/m2.
experiment title: abrupt quadrupling of CO2 plus reduction in total solar irradiance

description: Time slice at 1850 (picontrol) for G1ext to examine radiative forcing of abrupt4xCO2
experiment title: preindustrial conrol SSTs with quadrupled CO2 + solar reduction.
Questions/Comments/Notes: comparison of TOA fluxes from this simulation with those from the  piControl yields an estimate of forcing due to 4xCO2 plus compensating solar reduction (which should be near zero).

description: Time slice at 1949 (picontrol) for G1ext to examine radiative forcing of abrupt4xCO2 + G1
experiment title: year 100 SSTs from abrupt4xCO2 with quadrupled CO2 + solar reduction
Questions/Comments/Notes: comparison of TOA fluxes from this simulation with 10-year mean of fluxes centered around year 100 of 4xCO2 simulation yields an estimate of forcing due to solar reduction.

description: Time slice at 2020 (ScenarioMIP Tier 1 high forcing scenario)
experiment title: SSTs, forcings, and other prescribed conditions from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5
Questions/Comments/Notes: This provides a baseline for estimating time-evolving forcing in G6SST2-solar and GSST2-sulfur.

description: Using solar irradiance reduction, return the radiative forcing from a background of the ScenarioMIP high forcing to the ScenarioMIP middle forcing.
experiment title: total solar irradiance reduction to reduce net forcing from SSP585 to SSP245

description: Time slice at 2100 (G6solar)
experiment title: SSTs from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G6solar
Questions/Comments/Notes: comparison of TOA fluxes from this simulation with G6SST1 yields an estimate of forcing due to solar reduction.

description: Using equatorial SO2 injection, return the radiative forcing from a background of the ScenarioMIP high forcing to the ScenarioMIP middle forcing.
experiment title: stratospheric sulfate aerosol injection to reduce net forcing from SSP585 to SSP245

description: Time slice at 2100 (G6sulfur)
experiment title: SSTs from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G6sulfur
Questions/Comments/Notes: comparison of TOA fluxes from this simulation with G6SST1 yields an estimate of forcing due to aerosol shading.

description: Against a background of the ScenarioMIP high forcing, reduce cirrus cloud optical depth by a constant amount
experiment title: G7cirrus _ increase cirrus ice crystal fall speed to reduce net forcing in SSP585 by 1 W m-2

description: Time slice at 2020 (ScenarioMIP Tier 1 high forcing scenario + cirrus thinning according to G7cirrus)
experiment title: SSTs from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2020 of SSP5-8.5 + cirrus thinning
Questions/Comments/Notes: comparison of TOA fluxes from this simulation with 10-year mean of fluxes centered around year 2020 of SSP5-8.5 yields estimate of cirrus forcing.

description: Time slice at 2100 (ScenarioMIP Tier 1 high forcing scenario + cirrus thinning according to G7cirrus)
experiment title: SSTs from year 2100 of SSP5-8.5; forcings and other prescribed conditions from year 2100 of G7cirrus
Questions/Comments/Notes: similar to above run but for the warmer climate near 2100.  If forcing is independent of climate state, then there will be no difference from the above.

description: Extended AMIP run that covers 1870-2014. All natural and anthropogenic historical forcings as used in CMIP6 Historical Simulation will be included. AGCM resolution as CMIP6 Historical Simulation. The HadISST data will be used.
Questions/Comments/Notes: Can this be simply named AMIP?  Same but for longer period.  In column B, start date should be changed to 1870.

description: The topography of the highlands in Africa, N. America and S. America TP is modified by setting surface elevations to a certain height (500m).Same model as DECK.
The topography of the TIP is modified by setting surface elevations to 500m; to understand the combined thermal and mechanical forcing of the TIP. Same model as DECK.
Surface sensible heat released at the elevation above 500m over the TIP is not allowed to heat the atmosphere.Same model as DECK.
Pacemaker 20th century historical run that includes all forcing as used in CMIP6 Historical Simulation, and the observational historical SST is restored in the AMO domain (0o-70oN, 70oW-0o)
Questions/Comments/Notes: are these partially-prescribed SSTs, but partially coupled models?

description: Pacemaker 20th century historical run that includes all forcing as used in CMIP6 Historical Simulation, and the observational historical SST is restored in the tropical lobe of the IPO domain (20oS-20oN, 175oE-75oW). The HadISST data will be used.
Questions/Comments/Notes: are these partially-prescribed SSTs, but partially coupled models?

description: Coupled integrations, at least one with constant 1950"s forcing (CTL) and one or more with historic and then RCP4.5 (as in Forced_Atmos_Land, EXP).
experiment title: coupled control with fixed 1950's forcing (HighResMIP equivalent of pre-industrial control)

description: Coupled integrations, at least one with constant 1950"s forcing (CTL) and one or more with historic and then RCP4.5 (as in Forced_Atmos_Land, EXP).
experiment title: coupled future 2015-2050 using a scenario as close to CMIP5 RCP8.5 as possible within CMIP6
Questions/Comments/Notes: The forcing for this run in unclear.  There is mention of multiple future scenarios in the proposal.  We need a more specific name here.  ANS.: There is now only mention of RCP8.5 - the problem we have is there is not much clarity about SSP scenarios, and timescales for their production, and the similarity with RCP8.5

description: Coupled integrations, at least one with constant 1950"s forcing (CTL) and one or more with historic and then RCP4.5 (as in Forced_Atmos_Land, EXP).
experiment title: coupled historical 1950-2014
Questions/Comments/Notes: should this and other simulations be initialized at the beginning of 1951 or beginning of 1950?

description: Forced global atmosphere-land simulations using daily 1/4 degree SST and sea-ice forcings, and aerosol concentrations (not emissions) to constrain model spread
experiment title: forced atmosphere experiment for 1950-2014

description: Extend Forced_Atmos_land to 2050 with agreed forcings (with option to extend further to 2100)
experiment title: forced atmosphere experiment for 2015-2050 using SST/sea-ice derived from CMIP5 RCP8.5 simulations and a scenario as close to RCP8.5 as possible within CMIP6
Questions/Comments/Notes: The forcing for this run in unclear.  There is mention of multiple future scenarios in the proposal.   ANS: See above - the future SST and sea-ice has to be derived from CMIP5 simulations, so we will try to match the CMIP6 forcings (when they become available for the future) with this as well as possible,

description: Forced global atmosphere-land simulations as highresSST-present, but using an common LAI dataset across models.
experiment title: common LAI dataset within the highresSST-present experiment

description: Forced global atmosphere-land simulations as highresSST-present, but using smoothed SST to investigate impact of SST variability.
experiment title: smoothed SST version of highresSST-present

description: Similar to CFMIP amip-p4K, add a uniform warming of 4K to highresSST-present SSTs and run the experiment parallel to years 2005-2014 of highresSST-present.
experiment title: uniform 4K warming of highresSST-present SST

description: Similar to CFMIP amip-4xCO2, SSTs are held at highresSST-present  values and the CO2 seen by the radiation scheme is quadrupled. Run over years 2005-2014 of highresSST-present.
experiment title: highresSST-present SST with 4xCO2 concentrations

description: Idealized 1%/yr CO2 increase to 4xC02 over 140yrs and kept constant at 4xCO2 for an additional 200 to 400 yrs simulation with ice sheets forced "offline" with DECK 1pctCO2 using a standard forcing.
experiment title: offline ice sheet model forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM 1pctCO2to4x output

description: Idealized 1%/yr CO2 increase to 4xC02 over 140yrs and kept constant at 4xCO2 for an additional 200 to 400 yrs simulation with ice sheets forced "offline" with DECK 1pctCO2 using forcing from its own AOGCM
experiment title: offline ice sheet model forced by ISM's own AOGCM 1pctCO2to4x output

description: Idealized 1%/yr CO2 increase to 4xC02 over 140yrs and kept constant at 4xCO2 for an additional 200 to 400 yrs simulation that includes interactive ice sheets.
experiment title: simulation with interactive ice sheet forced by 1 percent per year increase in CO2 to 4xCO2 (subsequently held fixed)

description: Present-day control simulation for "offline" ice sheets.
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM pdControl output

description: Pre-industrial control simulation for "offline" ice sheets.
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISM's own AOGCM piControl output

description: Pre-industrial control simulation that includes interactive ice sheets.
experiment title: preindustrial control with interactive ice sheet

description: Historical simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is the standard dataset based on CMIP6 AOGCM historical.
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM historical output

description: Historical simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is from its own AOGCM.
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISM's own AOGCM historical output

description: Historical simulation that includes interactive ice sheets. Set up follows the historical experiment
experiment title: historical with interactive ice sheet

description: Future climate ScenarioMIP SSP5-8.5 simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is the standard dataset based on ScenarioMIP ssp585
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AOGCM ssp585 output

description: Future climate ScenarioMIP SSP5-8.5 simulation using "offline" ice sheet models. Forcing for ice sheet model is from its own AOGCM.
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISM's own AOGCM ssp585 output

description: Future climate from ScenarioMIP SSP5-8.5 simulation that includes interactive ice sheets. Set up follows the standard SSP5-8.5 experiment
experiment title: ssp585 with interactive ice sheet

description: Offline ice sheet evolution for the last few decades forced by amip
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AGCM AMIP output

description: Last interglacial simulation of ice sheet evolution driven by PMIP lig127k
experiment title: offline ice sheet forced by ISMIP6-specified AGCM last interglacial output

experiment title: initialized from "historical" run year 1980, but with land conditions initialized from pseudo-observations

description: Additional land use policy sensitivity simulation for high radiative forcing scenario, keep all forcings the same as in C4MIP esmssp5-8.5 scenario except use SSP1-2.6 land use; emission driven
experiment title: emissions-driven SSP5-8.5 with SSP1-2.6 land use

description: Same as CMIP6 historical but with land cover held at 1850, no human activity; concentration driven
experiment title: historical with no land-use change

description: Idealized deforestation experiment, 20 million km2 forest removed linearly over a period of 50 years, with an additional 30 years with no specified change in forest cover; all other forcings held constant
experiment title: idealized transient global deforestation

description: Same as land-hist except starting from either 1700 (for models that typically start in 1850) or 1850 (for models that typically start in 1700).
experiment title: historical land-only alternate start year

description: Same land model configuration as used in CMIP6 coupled experiments with all applicable land-use features active. Start year either 1850 or 1700 depending on standard practice for particular model. All forcings transient including CO2, N-dep, aerosol dep, etc.
experiment title: historical land-only
Questions/Comments/Notes: This experiment is also called for by LS3MIP

description: Same as land-hist except with CO2 held constant
experiment title: historical land-only constant CO2

description: Same as land-hist except with CO2 held constant
experiment title: historical land-only constant climate

description: Same as land-hist except no land-use change
experiment title: historical land-only with no land-use change

description: Same as land-hist except with crop area utilizing prognostic crop model
experiment title: historical land-only with crops but no crop management

description: Same as land-hist except with net LUC transitions instead of gross LUC transitions. If gross transitions exceeding net transitions have been applied in 1850, they should be maintained.
experiment title: historical land-only with net land-use transitions

description: Same as land-hist but with anthropogenic ignition and suppression held to 1850 levels
experiment title: historical land-only with no human fire management

description: Same as land-hist but with wood harvest maintained at 1850 amounts/areas
experiment title: historical land-only with no wood harvest

description: Same as land-hist but with grazing and other management on pastureland held at 1850 levels/distribution, i.e. all new pastureland is treated as unmanaged grassland (as in land-crop-grass).
experiment title: historical land-only with constant pastureland

description: Same as land-hist but with all new crop and pastureland treated as unmanaged grassland
experiment title: historical land-only with cropland as natural grassland

description: Same as land-hist but with irrigated area held at 1850 levels
experiment title: historical land-only with no irrigation

description: Same as land-hist but with fertilization rates and area held at 1850 levels/distribution
experiment title: historical land-only with no fertilizer

description: Additional land use policy sensitivity simulation for low radiative forcing scenario, keep all forcings the same as ScenarioMIP SSP1-2.6 (afforestation scenario), but replace land use from SSP3-7 (afforestation) scenario; concentration-driven
experiment title: SSP1-2.6 with SSP3-7.0 land use

description: Additional land use policy sensitivity simulation for high radiative forcing scenario, keep all forcings the same as ScenarioMIP SSP3-7 (deforestation scenario), but replace land use from SSP1-2.6 (afforestation) scenario; concentration-driven
experiment title: SSP3-7.0 with SSP1-2.6 land use

description: Global ocean - sea-ice coupled experiment forced with the Coordinated Ocean - ice Reference Experiments inter-annually varying atmospheric and river data sets for years 1948-2009. Initial ocean tracer fields are based on observations. All Priority=1 OMIP diagnostics are requested for all five cycles of the 62-year forcing to quantify drift. All OMIP diagnostics (Priority=1,2,3) are requested for the 5th cycle.
experiment title: OMIP experiment forced by Large & Yeager (CORE-2, NCEP) atmospheric data set and initialized with observed physical and biogeochemical ocean data

description: Same as the omipv1 experiment except that it is not initialized with observed climatologies; rather it is initialized with results from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical models. Also it includes radiocarbon to evaluate deep-ocean circulation.
experiment title: OMIP experiment forced by Large & Yeager (CORE-2, NCEP) atmospheric data set and initialized from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical model

description: Global ocean - sea-ice coupled experiment forced with the JRA-55 inter-annually varying atmospheric and river data sets for years 1958-2016. Initial ocean tracer fields are based on observations.  All Priority=1 OMIP diagnostics are requested for all five cycles of the 59-year forcing to quantify drift.  All OMIP diagnostics (Priority=1,2,3) are requested for the 5th cycle.
experiment title: OMIP experiment forced by JRA-55 atmospheric data set and initialized with observed physical and biogeochemical ocean data

description: Same as the omipv2 experiment except that it is not initialized with observed climatologies; rather it is initialized with results from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical models. Also it includes radiocarbon to evaluate deep-ocean circulation.
experiment title: OMIP experiment forced by JRA-55 atmospheric data set and initialized from at least a 2000-year spin up of the coupled physical-biogeochemical model

experiment title: effective radiative forcing in present-day

description: Offline radiation calculations
experiment title: offline assessment of radiative transfer parmaeterizations in clear skies

description: Future scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP2.6 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP1. Concentration-driven.
experiment title: update of RCP2.6 based on SSP1

description: Extension of SSP1_26 to 2300, in style of CMIP5 extension. Extends negative emissions level reached in 2100 to produce slowly declining forcing.
experiment title: long-term extension of ssp126 to 2300
Questions/Comments/Notes: an extension of ssp126, so doesn't need a separate experiment_id

description: Extension of SSP5_34over to 2300
experiment title: long-term extension of ssp534over to 2300
Questions/Comments/Notes: an extension of ssp534-over, so doesn't need a separate experiment_id

description: 21st century overshoot scenario relative to SSP5_34. Branches from SS5_85 at 2040 with emissions reduced to zero by 2070 and negative thereafter.
experiment title: overshoot of 3.4 W/m**2 branching from ssp585 in 2040

description: Future scenario with medium radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP6.0 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP4. Concentration-driven.
experiment title: update of RCP6.0 based on SSP4

description: Future scenario with medium radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP4.5 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP2. Concentration-driven.
experiment title: update of RCP4.5 based on SSP2

description: Future scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Reaches about 7.0 W/m2 by 2100; fills gap in RCP forcing pathways between 6.0 and 8.5 W/m2. Concentration-driven. At least 9 further perturbed IC ensemble members (if not 9, as many as possible).
experiment title: IC ensemble of ssp370
Questions/Comments/Notes: an esemble of ssp370, so doesn't need a separate experiment_id

description: Future scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Reaches about 7.0 W/m2 by 2100; fills gap in RCP forcing pathways between 6.0 and 8.5 W/m2. Concentration-driven.
experiment title: gap-filling scenario reaching 7.0 based on SSP3

description: Future scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of century. Reaches about 3.4 W/m2 by 2100; fills gap in RCP forcing pathways between 4.5 and 2.6 W/m2. Concentration-driven.
experiment title: gap-filling scenario reaching 3.4 based on SSP4

description: Future scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP8.5 global forcing pathway but with new forcing based on SSP5. Concentration-driven.
experiment title: update of RCP8.5 based on SSP5

description: Extension of SSP5_85 to 2300, in style of CMIP5 extension. Assumes emissions eventually decline from 2100 levels to produce stabilized forcing by 2300.
experiment title: long-term extension of ssp585 to 2300
Questions/Comments/Notes: an extension of ssp534, so doesn't need a separate experiment_id

description: Future scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of century. Following a forcing pathway below RCP2.6. Specific SSP and 2100 forcing level to be finalized with IAM groups within next few months. Concentration-driven.
experiment title: low-end scenario informing 1.5C goal
Questions/Comments/Notes: "x" AND "y" have yet to be determined PRECISELY

description: Early 19th century cluster of strong tropical volcanic eruptions, including the 1809 event of unknown location, the 1815 Tambora and 1835 Cosigueina eruptions. Experiment initialized from PiControl
experiment title: 19th century volcanic cluster initialized from PiControl

description: Early 19th century cluster of strong tropical volcanic eruptions, including the 1809 event of unknown location, the 1815 Tambora and 1835 Cosigueina eruptions. Experiment initialized from past1000 (all forcings except volcanic kept constant from year AD 1790 on).
experiment title: 19th century volcanic cluster initialized from past1000
Questions/Comments/Notes: NOTE: This experiment was not included in the originally submitted proposal (but it is included in the GMDD paper)

description: Idealized equatorial eruption corresponding to an initial emission of 56.2 Tg of SO2. The eruption magnitude corresponds to recent estimates for the 1815 Tambora eruption (Sigl et al., 2015), the largest historical tropical eruption, which was linked to the so-called “year without a summer” in 1816. Experiment initialized from PiControl.
experiment title: idealized equatorial volcanic eruption emitting 56.2 Tg SO2

description: Idealized Northern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2. Experiment initialized from PiControl.
experiment title: idealized Northern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2

description: 1991 Pinatubo forcing as used in the CMIP6 historical simulations. Requires special diagnostics of parameterized and resolved wave forcings, radiative and latent heating rates. A large number of ensemble members is required to address internal atmospheric variability. Experiment initialized from PiControl.
experiment title: Pinatubo experiment

description: As volc-pinatubo-full, but as decadal prediction runs. Joint experiment with DCPP, forcing input and implementation of the forcing fully comply with the VolMIP protocol.
experiment title: Pinatubo experiment for decadal climate prediction
Questions/Comments/Notes: please confirm this information is correct.

description: slab control run for volc-piinatubo-slab
experiment title: control with slab ocean

description: As volc-pinatubo-full, but with a slab ocean.
experiment title: Pinatubo experiment with slab ocean

description: As volc-pinatubo-full, but with prescribed aerosol heating rates in the stratosphere. Complimentary experiment to volc-pinatubo-surf.
experiment title: Pinatubo experiment with partial radiative forcing, includes only stratospheric warming

description: As volc-pinatubo-full, but with prescribed surface cooling patterns or net  surface flux changes. Complimentary experiment to volc-pinatubo-strat.
experiment title: Pinatubo experiment with partial radiative forcing, solar radiation scattering only

description: Parallel experiment to volc-cluster-ctrl, using restart files from the end of the historical simulation instead of from piControl, and boundary conditions from the 21st century SSP2-4.5 scenario experiment of ScenarioMIP
experiment title: volcanic cluster experiment under 21st century SSP2-4.5 scenario

description: Idealized Northern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2. Experiment initialized from PiControl.
experiment title: Idealized Southern Hemisphere high-latitude eruption emitting 28.1 Tg of SO2
